name: Portfolio-Optimization
description: Modern Portfolio Theory optimizer analyzing 20+ stock portfolios using Markowitz mean-variance framework. Implements comprehensive risk analytics calculating VaR, CVaR, and Sharpe ratios across 5-year historical datasets with Monte Carlo simulations.

name: Stock-Price-Prediction
description: Time series forecasting using LSTM networks for stock prediction with advanced feature engineering and backtesting framework.

name: Options-Pricing-Engine
description: Black-Scholes model and Monte Carlo simulations for options pricing with Greeks computation.

name: Olympic-data-analysis
description: Statistical analysis of 120,000+ Olympic athlete records spanning 120 years with interactive visualizations.

name: CricMetrics-Pro-IPL
description: Analysis of 578 IPL matches processing 50,000+ ball-by-ball records with Power BI dashboards.

name: SMS-Spam-Detection
description: NLP spam classifier achieving 98%+ accuracy using NLTK, TF-IDF, and scikit-learn ensemble methods.

name: Image-Colorization-GANs
description: Deep learning system for grayscale-to-color image translation using conditional GANs trained on 10,000+ images.

name: Image-Classification-CNN
description: CNN implementation for multi-class classification using TensorFlow with transfer learning from ResNet and VGG.

name: CUDA-Image-Processing
description: GPU-accelerated image processing achieving 50x speedup using CUDA C++ with optimized parallel algorithms.
